title: Adjustment of employee's salary
content: To change an employee's salary you have two options:If you have a web service (Nethris or Employeur D), please follow the steps mentioned in this article.If you do not have a web service you can do it manually from the employee's file and even make a batch change. (See explanation below).To change an employee's salary manuallyGo to the Employee file,Click on Remuneration,Click on  in the Remuneration Adjustments section,Complete the next window,Click on Save,In the Remuneration and Cumulative Premiums Check your premiums and click on Save.If you have Web service (Nethris or Employer D), refer to the following article: Payroll information retrieval and employee update.To change the salary of several employees at once (batch)See this article for instructions on batch salary processing: Ajuster le salaire des employés en lot If you have web service (Nethris or Employeur D), refer to the following article: Payroll information retrieval and employee updateRelated articles:  Cumulative premium presentation Overtime cumulative premium Fix cumulative premium   Helpful?00Updated: 2 years ago Share :
